contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=May 2010}} {{Politics of Uganda}} The '''Uganda Patriotic Movement''' is a defunct [[political party]] in [[Uganda]]. It was founded by [[Yoweri Museveni]] and participated in the December 1980 [[Elections in Uganda|general elections]], which were won by [[Milton Obote]]'s [[Uganda People's Congress]]. The election results were disputed, leading Museveni to form the [[National Resistance Movement]] and its military wing—the [[National Resistance Army]]—with which he waged a [[Guerrilla warfare|guerrilla rebellion]] against Obote's government. In 1986, Museveni became president. [[Category:Political parties in Uganda]] {{Africa-party-stub}} {{Uganda-stub}}
